about_the_game:
Worlds We Know is the fifth wonderful illustration from the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. There are a lot of details in this puzzle and several distinct areas that can be used as anchors to assemble your build around them. All in all, this should be a relatively easy puzzle box even for casual players.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.
